attributes.action: vote of no confidence in coalition government call for general election
attributes.additional_details:
As this tory run coalition has come to govern our once great country, We are now seeing unemployment, food bank increasing on a daily basis, children hungry, disabled people being victimised for having a spare room. But the super rich are prospering due to 5% tax cut.
we the people need a government who will look at the interests of the whole country and not the few rich contributors to their party.
 As Nick clegg issued in his party political broadcast they will save us £600.00 per year what could you do with it.
( answer. He could buy anew helmet for skiing, just shows the difference in his world to the 90% of the nation. who are homeless, hungry, debt ridden.

The question you need to ask yourself are we really in this together.
